name: Closing Ceremony
description: During the closing session, the organizing team will provide a summary of all the valuable discussions and outcomes that have taken place throughout the day. They will discuss the future directions of EVM development, exploring ideas and other ways for collaboration, and potential future events.

speakers.name: Alex Beregszaszi
speakers.bio: Alex is the team lead of Ipsilon at the Ethereum Foundation, a group focused on improving the EVM. Alex has been an early contributor and co-lead of the Solidity team.
